item.title: How to set the server key on Brother scanner
new solo keys
item.description: 08:23 Thursday 17 January 2019 JST I got my new solo keys! But now my USB keyboard is not working. Going to reboot now.

item.title: To Do Today
item.description: 12:48 Thursday 06 October 2016 JST I forgot my keys today, so I hope someone is in the office in Ebisu. lesson with Chika and Ayano attend e-I-group write a journal entry figure out why adding records to table user_log didn’t work as I expected add records table user_log inform Akane make a note to submit money-sending applications tomorrow email Mike email Soness chat with Tobias teach in Akihabara sleeeeeep
